title.english: Stella of the Theater: World Dai Star

description:
Theater has taken the entire world by storm in the 20th century, and teenager Kokona Ohtori aims to take the big stage. Performers who shine the brightest are called Dai Stars, and for Kokona, her first step into stardom is auditioning for the prominent theater troupe—Sirius. As she cultivates her unique sense for the stage, a story of passion and aspiration unfolds in this super-theater age.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

title.native: ワールドダイスター：アンコール！

name.native: カトリナ・グリーベル

node.description:
He founded the adult game brand [Minato Soft](http://minatosoft.com/t4p/) in 2006.

[Website](http://www.takahiro.ms/index.htm) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takahiro4p)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [mangaka](https://anilist.co/staff/256771/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

__Graduated:__ Todaiji Gakuen Junior and Senior High School, Tokyo University of Foreign Studies

__[Website](http://rebrast.com/creators/uz/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Boundnotes)__

__Tatsuya Yano__ is a Japanese guitarist, violinist, composer, arranger, lyricist and trackmaker.
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.
